name: Thea Energy
description: Thea Energy Pvt Ltd has been promoted by a team of Technocrats having decades of experience in the Power Electronics Industry. With group team strength of more than 600, mostly engineers, we take pride in having successfully promoted multiple Brands in the Power Industry over the years. We have offices all across the country to support thousands of our customers and are respected for customer services in the power industry.
slogan: Leading Solar Inverter Manufacturer in India
